body: @ogelevil259  oMGGG I ended watching the anime instead but GRAND BLUEEEE❤️ngl   Was watching more Nichijou and Lucky Star but I did watch Daily lives of Highschool Boys but probably because of the artstyle...never got attached much     wish I can go back to those days
This series makes for good hentai

When you were partying, I studied the blade. When you were having premarital sex, I mastered the blockchain. While you wasted your days at the gym in pursuit of vanity, I cultivated inner strength. And now that the world is on fire and the barbarians are at the gate you have the audacity to come to me for help?

@Sussy Paimon(?) Personally I found Daily Lives of High School Boys to be the funniest anime ever but Nichijou is definitely among the best of the best. Some other top comedy anime and manga are the Grand Blue manga, the D-Frag manga (the anime was bad. don't watch it.), and most of Sabagebu which was the funniest shit ever 80% of the time and one of the worst anime I've ever seen for the remaining 20%.
Nah but really  this was literally the greatest comedy to ever exist  anime wise😭😭😭
